document.full_text: jennifer lawrence, the oscar-nominated star of "winter's bone," has been officially cast as plucky protagonist katniss everdeen in "hunger games," the film adaptation of the suzanne collins young adult novel.
document.title: jennifer lawrence to star in "hunger games"
lines_and_colors: jennifer lawrence, the oscar-nominated star of "winter's bone," has been officially cast as plucky protagonist katniss everdeen in "hunger games," the film adaptation of the suzanne collins young adult novel.
